'''Beta 1.21.30.25''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.30.25''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the fifth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.30]], released on August 28, 2024<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/29723785319053|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.30.25|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 28, 2024}}</ref>, which fixes [[mace]]-related bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Mace]]'''
*Reverted a change that caused several bugs with the mace regarding stacking, enchanting, and durability. As a consequence, mobs are once again unable to do mace smash attacks.<ref>{{bug|MCPE-185896}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.30.25 Preview
|;previous
|184789|Pointed dripstones are upside down at the bottom of "encounter_4" and "trapped_staircase" chamber.
|185896|Mace stacks up to 64.
|186155|Mace can break some blocks in creative mode.
}}</onlyinclude>
